feed.title: Trend Business and Market
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: The Plastic Profit Podcast: Unveiling the Future of the Plastic Sector
entry.summary: In the world, there have been several developments across different sectors. ICICI Securities predicts that the profitability and demand in the plastic sector will likely improve from the second half of FY25E. Meanwhile, a German union has stated that a four-day workweek is conceivable for Volkswagen, and they will consider all options. Radico Khaitan has unveiled new limited edition cask strength whiskies in their Rampur Jugalbandi series. Suzlon Energy shares have gained as ICICI Securities has increased their target price, making it a potential multibagger. However, the Nifty and Senex have dropped for the second consecutive day due to concerns about valuations. HDFC Securities believes that Medplus Health Services' growth drivers are intact, with generics scale-up being a key factor. In terms of weather, heavy rains have lashed parts of Andhra Pradesh and Chhattisgarh as clouds deepen over the adjoining Bay of Bengal. Despite a slowdown in the June quarter, Governor Das supports RBI's GDP growth forecast. Lastly, car dealers are hopeful for festive sales, even as concerns about rainfall remain.
